DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal project determine anticaries benefit prototype multi-mineral mouthrinse contain 225 ppm fluoride 30 ppm Ca remineralization enamel white-spots ( non-cavitated lesion ) . The selection patient pre-existing white-spot lesion permit opportunity evaluate efficacy multi-mineral mouthrinse reminerzalizing and/or inhibit progression enamel white-spot lesion .
DOC.criteria: To participate study , panelist require meet follow criterion : 1 . Subjects must 13 65 year age ; 2 . Subjects must read sign Informed Consent prior initiation study procedure . All subject receive copy sign Informed Consent ; 3 . Subjects must reasonable functional dentition , without large number miss teeth , teeth # 's 2227 present ; 4 . Have normal salivary gland function ( unstimulated whole salivary flow rate equal great 0.25 ml/min paraffin stimulate whole salivary flow rate equal least 1.0 ml/min ) ; 5 . Subjects must willing participate study , able follow study direction , willing return specify visit appoint time , use product per instruction ; 6 . Subjects must good general health base medical history oral soft hard tissue examination . Criteria permit participation study follow : 1 . Any subject pregnant lactating base oral interview pregnancy may interfere outcome study ; 2 . Any subject systemic health condition diabetes could affect outcome study discretion examiner ; 3 . Any subject oral condition , excessive , untreated dental caries , periodontal disease , chronic dental neglect , oral pathology include xerostomia determine oral examination subject history opinion dental examiner could affect outcome study ; 4 . Any subject full denture , full orthodontic appliance . No use nightguards permit study period ; 5 . Any subject use oral care product ( permit ) treatment washout period ; 6 . Any subject immunological disorder HIV positive , AIDS , systemic Lupus Erythematosis ; 7 . Any subject concurrently participate another clinical study ; 8 . Any subject currently take antibiotic medication , opinion Investigator/Examiner might influence study outcome ; 9 . Any subject history sensitivity oral product allergies ingredient product ; 10 . Any subject fail keep scheduled appointment .
